boardgame.name: Ca$h _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;n Guns (Second Edition)
Ka$a i Spluwy
boardgame.description: In an abandoned warehouse a gangster band is splitting its loot, but they can't agree on the split! It's time to let the guns talk and soon everyone is aiming at everyone. The richest surviving gangster wins the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ca$h 'n Guns helps you relive the best scenes of your favorite gangster movies. The goal is to have more money than anyone else after eight rounds while still being alive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round, one player is the Boss, and he controls the pace of play. First, loot cards are revealed on the table to show what's up for grabs. Next, players load their guns by secretly selecting either a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Bang!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Click! Click!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card from their hand. The Boss counts to three, and on _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Three_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; each player points his foam gun at someone else; due to his status, the Boss can tell one player who's pointing a gun at him that he needs to point it in another direction. After a pause to observe threats and measure the seriousness in an opponent's eyes, the Boss counts to three again and anyone who doesn't want to risk getting shot can chicken out and remove themselves from the round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Everyone who's pointing a gun at someone still in the round now reveals their card, and anyone who's the target of a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Bang!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; takes a wound marker and gets none of the available loot. Starting with the Boss, everyone still in the round takes one loot card at a time from the table _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; money, diamonds, paintings, the position of Boss, medical care (to remove a wound), or a new bullet (to add a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Bang!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card to your hand) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; until everything has been claimed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After eight rounds, the game ends. Whoever has the most diamonds receives a big bonus, and paintings score based on the number of them that you've collected. Whoever has the most valuable stash wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Asmodee (ASMCGYEN03) The big heist may have been a success, but it all goes wrong when every crook wants a bigger cut. With this much money on the table, bullets speak louder than words! In Cash _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;n Guns, players will point foam pistols at each other and try to intimidate their opponents into letting them have the largest share. The bravest crooks enjoy the most money - but only if they live long enough to spend it!
Repos Productions Max Estimated Shipping $11.30

Brand new and sealed Payment: Payments are handled by Paypal (debit/credit cards accepted + Paypal account transfers) and your order will be processed as soon we have received the payment confirmation from Paypal. IMPORTANT: Deliveries will only be made to the delivery address you enter during the Paypal payment procedure. UK Shipping: From Monday to Friday we will normally dispatch your goods within 24 hours Shipping costs are £3 GBP with royal Mail In the rare event of a package getting lost don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t worry, all postage is insured against loss. Shipping to EU countries: Please ask us for a quote before you order a game from us. IMPORTANT: WE ARE ONLY SHIPPING TO EU-COUNTRIES! 100% Money Back Guarantee: If you are unhappy with your purchase, please contact us within 14 calendar days. We will email you a postage label so you can return the game(s) to us (please unused and in the original condition and packaging). As soon as we have received the return a full refund will be made. If you receive a damaged or faulty game, please contact us immediately. We will email you a postage label so you can return the game to us. As soon as we have received it, we will send a replacement where possible. Where an exchange is not available, a 100% refund will be provided.

The bravest crooks enjoy the most money - but only if they live long enough to spend it!

Cash n Guns 2nd Edition This is a brand new, shrink wrapped copy of the game. --Payments-- - PayPal is used for all online transactions - Cash is accepted for pickups from our store (see collections). --Postage (UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe)-- -UK Shipping: Included (£2 surcharge to N.I.) -Europe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Channel Islands, please contact me for details Parcels are sent using MyHermes (though I reserve the right to change couriers at any time). This item is tracked and insured to the value of £20. If additional insurance is required please contact me to arrange (Buyer pays additional cost). I aim to dispatch all items within 72hrs of receiving payment and delivery normally takes 3-5 working days. If multiple items are bought I will combine shipping, please contact me to arrange this. I recycle packaging wherever possible to keep shipping costs as low as I am able. --Collection-- Your item can be collected from my store in Berkshire (RG45 7AD). Please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk to arrange. Selecting this option will avoid any shipping costs. I also attend games nights in Reading and Wokingham and can bring these with me. Again this avoids shipping costs, contact me to arrange. --Returns-- If you are unhappy with the product, please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk within 7 working days and we will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. --Multiple Purchase Discounts-- I am happy to offer discounts if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Please e-mail beforehand to discuss.

This game was kept in horizontal storage in a smoke free home. I typically only ship to the US, but I will consider shipping international if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re willing to pay shipping and insurance. Shipping will be roughly $15 for USPS flat rate priority. I have never sold here on BGG but I have completed many successful transactions on Reddit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Bazaar. Let me know if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to see pictures or gather any other information!
